mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jiaoshi_id as jiaoshiId ,a.tongzhi_name as tongzhiName ,a.tongzhi_types as tongzhiTypes ,a.tongzhi_photo as tongzhiPhoto ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.tongzhi_content as tongzhiContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name as jiaoshiName ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone as jiaoshiPhone ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_photo as jiaoshiPhoto ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email as jiaoshiEmail
FROM tongzhi a left JOIN jiaoshi jiaoshi ON a.jiaoshi_id = jiaoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.jiaoshi_id = #{params.jiaoshiId} )
and a.tongzhi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.tongzhiName},'%')
and a.tongzhi_types = #{params.tongzhiTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.tongzhi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.tongzhiContent},'%')
and a.jiaoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiName},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiPhone},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
